Heavy.name: Ceramic Plate
Heavy.description: A hefty plate carrier which holds front, back and side plates as well as extended amounts of gear.

Heavy.name: Ceramic Plate + Side Plates
Heavy.description: A hefty plate carrier which holds front, back and side plates as well as extended amounts of gear.  With side plates included. Take a -1m movement speed penalty.

Heavy.name: Ceramic Nano-Crystal, Titanium backed+Side plates
Heavy.description: Nano-Crystals harden on impact. Heavy side plates, take -1m to movement.

Heavy.name: Level 10 test
Heavy.description: Reduce speed by 1m per full action

Full.name: Carbon-Steel Fiber
Full.description: Covers the front of your chest, your back, your sides, shoulders, neck, pelvic region, and tops of your legs. Very heavy. -1m to movement.

Full.name: Ceramic Nano-Crystal
Full.description: Covers the front of your chest, your back, your sides, shoulders, neck, pelvic region, and tops of your legs. Very Heavy. -1m to movement.

Medium.name: Carbon-Steel Fiber, Titanium backed
Medium.description: A smaller plate carrier which holds a moderate amount of gear.

Medium.name: Carbon-Steel Fiber
Medium.description: A smaller plate carrier which holds a moderate amount of gear.

Concealed.name: Gunner Kit
Concealed.description: cannot be worn with plate carriers, soft armour, or tactical vests.

Concealed.name: Runner's Kit
Concealed.description: Conceal Rig, Shoulder Harness. Pistol Holster, 2 Pistol mags,cannot be worn with plate carriers, soft armour, or tactical vests.

Concealed.name: Clandestine Ops Kit
Concealed.description: cannot be worn with plate carriers, soft armour, or tactical vests. Sacrifice 2 primary mags for an extra pistol holster if you want.
